title: Joe Muer’s Bean Salad
directions: Toss all ingredients in mixing bowl and allow flavors to mingle for up to 24 hours if you have the time or for just a minute until
dinner is served. The flavors get better as time goes on; try to think ahead if you can. This is surprisingly tasty considering how very simple it is to prepare and very healthy too. Karen
ingredients: 1 can Great Northern Beans or Navy Beans (about 16 ounces) drained
¼ cup chopped red bell pepper
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
